name: 1v1 Battle with valorant weapons 2D
description:
1 vs 1 Combat with valorant weapons!

Controls 

---------------------------------------------------------

Player 1 :
A - D -> walk
W -> Jump
Space -> Shoot

Player 2 :
Right&Left Arrows  -> walk
Up Arrow -> Jump
Numpad 5 -> Shoot

Camera Controls :
Zoom in : P
Zoom out : O

---------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy.
